Articles.Content: Is there any mod that allows planning maneuvers not from a pilot, but from a mission point of view? Example: I want a Kerbin Synchroneus Orbit ABOVE KSC. MechJeb will gladly bring me to the right orbit, but there is no way to set up the mission parameter (location as langitude). Once I have a space station in place, I can transfer TO it, but first one has to have one.
KSP TOT is more advanced and may have what you want
